name: Powersoft Report File
summary: Learn about .PSR files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Sybase software products are used as Rapid Application Development (RAD) tools for building data-driven business applications and generating reports.
NOTE: Powersoft Reports may also be viewed in some Web browsers with the DataWindow Web ActiveX control plug-in.

description: Report generated by Sybase products, such as PowerBuilder, InfoMaker, or DataWindow Builder; stores a report template that has been filled with database information; used to store reports and send them over email.
